articles.author: Ryan Tolmich
articles.title: Lionel Messi and Inter Miami fall to Charlotte FC to close Argentine's first MLS campaign - Goal.com
articles.description: Lionel Messi's first MLS season ended in a disappointing defeat as Inter Miami fell to Charlotte FC 1-0 at Bank of America Stadium.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi's first MLS season ended in a disappointing defeat as Inter Miami fell to Charlotte FC 1-0 at Bank of America Stadium.

articles.title: Verstappen takes US F1 Sprint win ahead of Hamilton - Racingnews365.com
articles.description: Max Verstappen came out on top at the F1 Sprint from the Circuit of the Americas.
articles.content:
Max Verstappen has won the sprint race from the Circuit of the Americas, converting his pole position into victory.
